import React from 'react' import Data from "../../data" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const News = ({news}) => { const { id } = useParams(); const News = Data.slide const {content,img,text } = news.data const slideInfo = News.find((data) => data.id === Number(id) ) console.log(news.data) return (

Xəbərlər

{ news.img === 0? text : slideInfo.text }

{ news.img === 0? content : slideInfo.content}

) } export default News
